ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا دَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيْمَٰنَ عِلْمًا وَقَالَا ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى فَضَّلَنَا عَلَىٰ كَثِيرٍ مِّنْ عِبَادِهِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We gave knowledge to Dawud and Sulayman who said, 'Praise be to Allah who has favoured us over
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We gave David and Solomon knowledge; and they said: "All praise be to God who has favoured us over many of His creatures who believe."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (On the other hand), We granted knowledge to David and Solomon and they said: "All praise be to Allah Who has exalted us above many of His believing servants!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We gave knowledge to David and Soloman. They said, "It is only God who deserves all praise. He has exalted us above many of His believing servants."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We indeed bestowed great knowledge to Dawud and Sulaiman; and they both said, “All praise is to Allah, Who bestowed us superiority over many of His believing bondmen.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed We gave knowledge to Dawud and Sulayman, and they both said: "All praise be to Allah, Who has preferred us above many of His believing servants!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We gave knowledge to Dawood and Sulaiman, and they both said: Praise be to Allah, Who has made us to excel many of His believing servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And We gave David and Solomon knowledge and they said, 'Praise belongs to God who has preferred us over many of His believing servants.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We verily gave knowledge unto David and Solomon, and they said: Praise be to Allah, Who hath preferred us above many of His believing slaves!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We bestowed knowledge on David and Solomon and they both said, "Praise be to God who has exalted us above many of His believing servants."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We vouchsafed unto Daud and Sulaiman a knowledge, and the twain said: praise unto Allah Who hath preferred us above many of His believing bondmen!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly, We gave knowledge to David and Solomon, and they said, ‘All praise belongs to Allah, who granted us an advantage over many of His faithful servants.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We gave (in the past) knowledge to David and Solomon: And they both said: "Praise be to Allah, Who has favoured us above many of his servants who believe!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed We gave knowledge to Dawud (David) and Sulaiman (Solomon), and they both said: "All the praises and thanks be to Allah, Who has preferred us above many of His believing slaves!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We gave knowledge to David and Solomon. They said: 'Praise be to Allah who has preferred us above many of His believing worshipers'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We gave David and Solomon knowledge. They said, “Praise God, who has favored us over many of His believing servants.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We had certainly given to David and Solomon knowledge, and they said, "Praise [is due] to Allah, who has favored us over many of His believing servants."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:15] And verily We gave David and Solomon, his son, knowledge, of rendering [decisive] judgement between people, and [knowledge] of the speech of birds and of other things, and they said, giving thanks to God, ‘Praise be to God Who has favoured us, with prophethood and the disposal of jinn, humans and devils [to our service], over many of His believing servants’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We verily gave knowledge) and understanding through prophethood and judgeship (unto David) the son of Jesse (and Solomon) the son of David, (and they said) both of them: (Praise be to Allah) thanks and gratitude to Allah, (Who hath preferred us) through knowledge and prophethood (above many of His believing slaves!
